metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28734 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Out-of-bounds write when handling split HTTP headers; When handling split HTTP headers, GRUB2 HTTP code accidentally moves its internal data buffer point by one position. This can lead to a out-of-bound write further when parsing the HTTP request, writing a NULL byte past the buffer. It's conceivable that an attacker controlled set of packets can lead to corruption of the GRUB2's internal memory metadata.

criterions.comment: grub2 package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
grub2-signed package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
grub2-unsigned package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
